attributes.action: change the name of Downing Street and the official address of the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to accurately represent the ethos and embodiment of the current government, it is submitted that the official address of the Prime Minister and the Chancellor should be changed. 

It is recommended that for clarity the name of Downing Street should be changed to Sesame Street and that ‘10’ be replaced with ‘123’. 

It is respectfully suggested that in so doing the style of the current government will be accurately represented, and that Jim Henson be acknowledged for the ideas ciopied by the current government. 

We trust the Government will give serious consideration to this petition

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
